FuncDef: The display default-parameter mpls te cspf command displays the default Constraint Shortest Path First (CSPF) parameters and preferred Interior Gateway Protocol (IGP) type.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
A CSPF configuration can set a preferred IGP, either Intermediate System-to-Intermediate System (IS-IS) or Open Shortest Path First (OSPF). The default IGP type is OSPF. The display default-parameter mpls te cspf command displays the preferred IGP type.
